name: Sex Adventures - Futanari Mistress
description:
About the game
An explicit erotic visual novel about a young woman who goes to a Futanari Mistress to satisfy her needs. To Suki's surprise, Bianka has much more to offer than she expected.
Visual Novel description
Suki has been attracted to men her whole life but lately she’s been dreaming of having sex with her female friends.
She’s willing to try with a girl but she’s not sure if that’s enough for her.
Although she is attracted to the beauty and the tenderness of a woman, she feels that she needs a great “tool” to be satisfied.
Ready to explore her sexuality, Suki thinks about using the services of a Dominatrix.
Bianka, a dominant mistress, is exactly what she’s looking for. Tall, blonde, and intimidating, she is the right person to play with her mind and body.
Hiring a professional was the best way to start exploring BDSM, kinks, and fetishes but Bianka has many more surprises for Suki.
Let’s find out together how far both characters are willing to go and which of the two will be more naughty in this story…
